mapper.insert: insert into item (idx, category, itemname, itemprice, hit, sellCVS, averscore, eventType, itemimage) values (item_idx_seq.nextval, #{category}, #{itemName}, #{itemPrice}, #{hit}, #{sellCVS}, #{averscore}, #{eventType}, #{itemImage})
mapper.select: select * from item order by idx desc
select * from item where itemdate >= sysdate - 30 order by idx desc
select * from item where trim(category) = #{cate}
select count(*) from item
select count(*) from item where itemdate >= sysdate - 30
select * from item where idx = #{idx}
mapper.update: update item set hit = hit + 1 where idx = #{idx}
